adjective.description: Belonging to or characteristic of a culture postulated to exist in either the Eolithic or the Lower Palaeolithic age in Belgium and characterized by a lack of hand-axe tools.

noun.description: The Mesvinian period, culture, or industry. Usually with the.

origin: Early 20th century. From French Mesvinien from Mesvin, the name of a town in Belgium near Mons, where flint objects believed to be artefacts were found in 1867 + -ien.
